      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllPurchesedCouponsByType(CouponType type, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method give the customer the details of all the coupons that he purchased (from the join table with his id ) from the type that he want (from the coupon-type enum in the beans package )
      void logOut(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      to make shore that no one is using the facade directly with the url (without login first) we put the facade on the session in the log in and remove it in the log out (the filter will stop users without facade on there session).
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      this method get coupon and save his details in the join table in the data base with the coupon id as key .

        @RequestMapping(value="/coupon/customer/logOut",

 @ResponseBody
